review: In the past I've used Boxee, Roku, Apple TV, Chromecast, OUYA, Chinese Android boxes and 3 generations of WD TV.The Amazon Fire TV is the best all purpose device. It has great hardware specs, including a Bluetooth remote (so the Fire TV doesn't need line of site). It supports a lot of online streaming services including Amazon Prime. and best of all XBMC can be side loaded onto the device with minimal effort. XBMC does have a bit of a learning curve but there's a lot of community support.This device is a game changer.
